mapper.insert: insert into fComment values(#{fcNum}, #{id}, #{fNum}, #{content}, to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: select fcNum, id, fNum, content, to_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') regdate from fComment where fNum = #{fNum} order by fcNum
